name: Jutja.com
tagline: The Open Source Visual Project Management System
body:
Jutja.com is an online Visual Project Management Portal which leverages latest advancement in technology to bring you a refreshing managing experience .

 With an interface built around mind-maps, you get an instant overview in a single view, simulating creative thinking and making it easy to understand the connections b/w the tasks.
 You also get to have realtime discussions on tasks and issues without any lag, decreasing the lag.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
